page_content: The page warns about fraudulent support calls claiming to be from Microsoft and offers PDF guides for prevention.
The page provides information on how to redeem a promo code.
The page provides information on how to electronically file tax returns using eTax.zug software.
The page provides guidelines for electronic submissions to the commercial register, including the use of electronic signatures.
The page announces a new online portal for lottery and sports fund applications, with a video guide for user assistance.
The page provides guidelines on how to use eTax.zug software for filing tax returns for legal entities.
The page provides an A-Z list of IT services and guides for schools in Basel-Landschaft, including software like Adobe Creative Cloud and Microsoft 365.
